# Application to financial strategies

## Preliminaries {-}

:::{.definition name="portfolio"}
A (stock-bond) portfolio is a pair $(\phi_t, \psi_t)$ of real-valued processes. The security component $\phi$ should be $\mca F$-previsible. 
:::

Note that left-continuous (left-limit approaches correctly) $\phi_t(\forall \omega)$ is previsible.
